message: 'package' should be separated from previous statement.
Import statement for 'com.google.common.base.Strings' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'SPECIAL_IMPORTS' group, expecting group 'STANDARD_JAVA_PACKAGE' on this line.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - javax.servlet.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.io.IOException' import. Should be before 'javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest'.
Catch parameter name 'e' must match pattern '^[a-z][a-z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Abbreviation in name 'isOpenAPIRequest' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
